DOWNTOWN SPRINGDALE
SPRINGDALE ALERT
2018 BOND PROGRAM



  1. Music in Murphy lineup announced for 2019

    The Music in Murphy Summer Concert Series returns!! This year's lineup features Trey O'Dell from NBC's 'The Voice', Tater, Mater & Squarsh, Cadillac Jackson and the Bear Chasers. Shows will be held on Thursdays at 7 pm and are FREE to the public. Read on...

  2. Registration open for Adult, Youth Summer Basketball

    Registration for summer Youth and Adult basketball is now open and will continue through May 6th!! Cost is $60 per individual for youth league and $400 per team for adult league. To register, visit springdalear.gov/747/sports Read on...

  3. Youth Basketball Academy Registration Now Open!!

    Registration for the Springdale Parks and Recreation Youth Basketball Academy is now open and continues through April 30th. The clinics will be for ages 7-15 and will be held Monday and Wednesday nights. To register, visit springdalear.gov/747/sports Read on...

  4. Lane Closure on E. Wagon Wheel Road

    Springdale Public Works will be doing repairs and road widening on E. Wagon Wheel Rd. between N. 64th St. & Cory St. The work will begin Monday Feb. 25, weather permitting, and will continue until work is complete. Read More

  5. 2020 Census

    Read More

  6. What Has Happened to Maple St?!

    If you travel Maple Street or Holcomb Avenue regularly, you have encountered the recent installation of an on-street, protected bikeway. Read More

  7. City of Springdale wins the 2018 All-America City Award

    The City of Springdale has been named a winner of the 2018 All-America City Award! The theme of the award this year was "Promoting Equity through Inclusive Civic Engagement." Read More

  8. Springdale Parks and Recreation introduces Rec Zone Magazine

    Springdale Parks and Recreation is pleased to introduce the Rec Zone Magazine! Read More

  9. Pump Station Road Bridge Update

    Pump Station Road Bridge was irreparably damaged after the April 2017 flood. Learn more about our efforts to replace the bridge. Read More

  10. Springdale Parks and Rec win Field of the Year Award

    The Arkansas Turfgrass Association presented its 2018 Field of the Year award to Springdale Parks and Recreation. Read More

  11. Springdale Police Department Receives APCO Agency Training Program Certification

    The SPD is only the second agency in the state to have this distinction. This certification helped the Springdale Fire Department receive their accreditation and class one ISO rating. Read More

  12. Springdale Fire Department is Awarded International Accredited Status

    The SFD is one of more than 250 agencies to achieve Internationally Accredited Agency status with the CFAI and the Center for Public Safety Excellence, Inc. (CPSE). Read More
View All
